verbose_text: Both Src and Syk inhibition blocked Vav1-Tyr174 phosphorylation in a dose dependent manner, whereas pretreatment with PP3, an inactive analog of PP2, did not affect C. albicans induced phosphorylation of Vav1 at Tyr174 (XREF_FIG C).
evidence: Syk inhibition blocked Vav1-Tyr174 phosphorylation in a dose-dependent manner, whereas pretreatment with PP3, an inactive analog of PP2, did not affect C. albicans-induced phosphorylation of Vav1 at Tyr174
